Detailed Description

Manages a BaseTaskScheduler that is bound to a thread for execution.

A Runtime will spawn a thread and bind it to the run function within this class. If a Task has more than one threads associated with it, then this class is duplicated one per thread, each with a separate copy of the original BaseTaskScheduler.

Note
This class should only be called by the HTGS API

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

htgs::BaseTaskSchedulerRuntimeThread::BaseTaskSchedulerRuntimeThread ( int  threadId,
BaseTaskScheduler *  task,
std::shared_ptr< std::atomic_int >  numThreads 
)
inline

Constructs a BaseTaskSchedulerRuntimeThread with a specified BaseTaskScheduler and atomic number of threads that is shared among all other threads that operate with a copy of the same BaseTaskScheduler.

Parameters
threadIdthe thread Id for the task
taskthe task the thread is associated with
numThreadsthe number of threads that a task contains

void htgs::BaseTaskSchedulerRuntimeThread::terminate ( )
inline

Indicates that the thread is ready to be terminated.

This function will mark the thread is ready to be terminated, but will only end once the thread has finished processing its last data.
